message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it holds significant value that will benefit you greatly.
Alice, $20,000 is way above my budget. I'm really interested in this product, but I can only go up to $12,000.  Let me know if that works for you.
Bob, I understand your position, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  To make this work, I could come down to $18,000.  This is my final offer.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $18,000 is still too high for me. I'm willing to pay $14,000. This is my final offer, as I can get the product from John for $12,000. Let me know if you're willing to accept this.
